title: NFL Playoffs Divisional Round, QB pressure, Brightest stars, Picks that could change? Plus Nate Burleson on Derrick Henry and Deebo Samuel
itunes:title: NFL Playoffs Divisional Round, QB pressure, Brightest stars, Picks that could change? Plus Nate Burleson on Derrick Henry and Deebo Samuel
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson dive into the Divisional Round of NFL Playoffs looking at which QB has the most to gain or lose this weekend. The most impactful game could be in Lambeau where both Aaron Rodgers and Jimmy Garoppolo's future could be affected by the outcome. Kyle has a surprise pick for the player that needs to shine the brightest this weekend for their team. The crew makes their picks for the four games, but Kay isn't so sure that these picks won't change before kickoff. Nate Burleson drops by to talk Derrick Henry's return and Deebo Samuel.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
